results.overview: A young woman struggles to pay the hospital bills of her vegetative husband. Despite her hard work, there's no hope for him to ever wake up, until an opportunity arises.
results.title: Alice in Earnestland

results.overview: Depicts the bloody siege of the fortress of Port Arthur, one of the most strongly fortified positions in the world, during the Russo-Japanese War of (1904 - 1905). In the story dominated the character Lt Takeshi Kogyo (Teruhiko Aoi), teachers, and a reserve officer who became commander of the platoon and later company. At the same time monitors the conduct of the army commander general Nogi (Tatsuya Nakadai), which was commissioned of the emperor Matsuhito (Toshirô Mifune) to the conquest of the fort.
results.title: Port Arthur

results.overview: Two brothers part company only to be reunited when one is hired to stop a thief who turns out to be his sibling.
results.title: Blood for a Silver Dollar

results.overview: A swindler scams a newspaper reporter-photographer and then, not realizing where the man is employed, applies for a job at his newspaper.
results.title: Making a Living

results.overview: Set in the world of high-end sports card collecting in the 1990s, a retired Baseball pitcher attempts a comeback as a sports memorabilia agent attempts to capitalize on his success.
results.title: Untitled Adam Sandler/Josh Safdie Project

results.overview: A palpably rendered audiovisual essay draws together the distinct sensibilities of filmmakers Peter Mettler (The End of Time) and Emma Davie (I am Breathing) and philosopher David Abram (The Spell of the Sensuous) to forge a path into the places where humans and animals meet.
results.title: Becoming Animal

results.overview: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world.
results.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.

results.overview: This is an Italian live action film with Alessandro Tomei as Pinocchio.
results.title: The Adventures of Pinocchio

results.original_title: Ata tu arado a una estrella
results.overview: In 1997 the Argentine filmmaker Fernando Birri returned to his home country to film a documentary on the 30th anniversary of the death of Che Guevara and the relevance of utopias at that time. Carmen Guarini decided to record those moments. A rough edit of this film was hidden away on a fragile VHS tape for twenty years. Today, these images come to life and shed some light on the life of this Latin American poet and master filmmaker, who, at the age of 92, still refused to give up on his own utopias.
results.title: Tie Your Plow to a Star

results.original_title: Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat
results.overview: Joseph, the favored son of Jacob, is betrayed by his jealous brothers, sold into slavery, and driven to Egypt. Though beset with adversity, Joseph perseveres through wit and faith and becomes the Governor of Egypt, second only to the Pharaoh.
results.title: Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat

results.overview: An ambulance driver gets involved with a rich girl that might have a darker side.
results.title: Angel Face

results.original_title: Antes e Depois de São Bernardo
results.overview: Extras from the remastered DVD of the film São Bernardo by Leon Hirszman. The process of restoring the film, with testimonials from actors and the film's technical team.
results.title: Before and After S. Bernardo

results.overview: Carlos happily married. He has two children - Maria Isabel and Dani. During a trip to China he is killed in a plane crash and goes to heaven. After a time, he learns that not everything is ...
results.title: Angels Inc

results.overview: What is the meaning of life? What is love, humor, fear and death? Is it all just a dream? Who are we? Will we wake up, will we remember? Do beings from other dimensions help us? Can we finally understand the purpose of the Game? Who is the Creator? Where is the Kingdom of God? The new feature movie called The Meaning and Mystery of Life is looking for answers to these questions and many others as well.  Question for Petr Vachler, the author of the story and screenplay, and the movie director: Why did you decide to make such an author-pronounced movie?  “As a small kid I used to hide behind the house and cry because there was an end to everything, and there would be NOTHING afterwards. But what was that big NOTHING? This question accompanied me all my life, probably just like it has to the majority of us all.
results.title: The Meaning and Mystery of Life

results.overview: Riley Burdett, the artistic director of the Onota Theatre in Massachusetts, learns that the theatre’s Scrooge-like owner Regina is preparing to close. So, she calls upon the ghosts of Regina’s past, present, and future to change her mind. Meanwhile, Riley casts a big TV star, Sam Palmer, who has moved to the area to escape, as Bob Cratchit in “A Christmas Carol.”
results.title: A Show-Stopping Christmas

results.overview: When Ryu returns to pay homage to his deceased mentor, Gouken, he is tormented by disturbing memories of his master's killer (Gouki). In a quest to become a true martial arts master, he sets out to hone his street fighting skills and deliver himself from the haunting legacy of the dark hadou.
results.title: Street Fighter Alpha: Generations

results.original_title: The Phoenix and the Magic Carpet
results.overview: Stuck in their late Grandfather's country cottage with no TV, Anthea, Robert and Chris are resigned to a boring week until they find a mouldy old carpet and a strange golden egg. But when the egg accidentally falls into the bonfire, it hatches into the mythical firebird, the Gloden Phoenix. So begins an amazing journey and the adventure of a lifetime, as the Phoenix takes them to a land of enchantment, magic and fantasy - via a magic flying carpet. Written by L.H. Wong
results.title: The Phoenix and the Magic Carpet

results.overview: A man coping with the institutionalization of his wife because of Alzheimer's disease faces an epiphany when she transfers her affections to another man, a wheel chair-bound mute who also is a patient at the nursing home.
results.title: Away from Her

results.overview: A three-foot tall demon is sent to corrupt a virtuous, happy go-lucky salesman named Jack Polo during Christmas, but if he touches him then he falls under the man's control.
results.title: The Yattering And Jack

results.original_title: DC Super Hero Girls: Legends of Atlantis
results.overview: Siren steals the Book of Legends in order to locate the Trident of Atlantis and rule the entire ocean.
results.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Legends of Atlantis
